attributes.additional_details: As we go into the next Lockdown and the guidance is that we can exercise outside. It was OK when it was warm and lighter for longer. Now its dark and cold and the gym offers the respite from all of this and contributes to both mental and health wellbeing. Taking this away means you are making mental health worse
attributes.background: All Gyms are COViD secure. There is no evidence provided that cases increased in gyms. Keep them open under COVID secure measures and allow people to keep both mind and body healthy

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
